citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has its bird environment enhancement plan available and is following it. However, a review of the plan did not
indicate that the plan has been approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be in accordance with the
regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals
or reference guides. Facility must have the attending veterinarian review and approve the bird enhancement plan to
ensure that the birds are provided with the appropriate environment enhancements to promote their psychological well-
being.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: OCTOBER 2, 2024
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representatives.
n
